EditTextPreference.android:title: Refresh Time
EditTextPreference.android:summary: How many seconds to wait after picture upload.

ListPreference.android:title: Operation Mode
ListPreference.android:summary: Camera running manual (tap on screen for picture), normal, in background (waking up) the app or take pictures hidden with normal phone usage.

com.dngames.mobilewebcam.TimePickerPrefe.android:summary: Allow activity (upload) only from this time every day.
com.dngames.mobilewebcam.TimePickerPrefe.android:title: Daily Activity Start

com.dngames.mobilewebcam.TimePickerPrefe.android:summary: End activity (upload) at this time every day. Set same as start for always.
com.dngames.mobilewebcam.TimePickerPrefe.android:title: Daily Activity End

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: No Night Uploads
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Try to not upload nearly black (night) pictures. When enabled consumes a little more battery power!

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: SMS Commands
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Receive SMS commands 'photo', 'start', 'stop', 'reboot' and 'refresh NUMBER' for camera control!

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Detect Motion
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Take pictures only when motion has been detected.

com.dngames.mobilewebcam.SeekBarPreferen.android:title: Motion Trigger
com.dngames.mobilewebcam.SeekBarPreferen.android:summary: Detect only large image changes or even small ones.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Wait for Android Broadcast
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Register for this broadcast and take a picture when received. Be careful, read about the broadcasts/intents in Android SDK before using.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Take pictures
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Camera enabled on app start. Tap on screen to start if unchecked. Uncheck if you want to start auto mode manually.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Auto Reboot *ROOT only*
EditTextPreference.android:summary: This requires a rooted device! Reboot the device and app after the entered number of pictures! Some camera drivers crash after taking a number of pictures. Select autostart too! Allow superuser rights before!
